name: Evinrude
body:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/micz/evinrude/de29258631ca8bed1ece26a5da975515fbebf08f/evn_themes/default/img/evinrude_logo.png)

Evinrude is a small but powerful CMS based only on text files.  
There is no need for a database!

See the [features](Features) list and what will be [next](Next).

**05/06/2009 - Evinrude 1.1 released! Now with dynamic plugins!  
[Download it now!](https://github.com/micz/evinrude/releases)**

You can also read the [changelog](ChangeLog).

Check the [installation guide](Installation).

**Try Evinrude in the demo site: http://evinrude.micz.it/**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
